hero.title: Kizin PVC ki dire nan klima Ayiti
hero.subtitle: Kabann kizin PVC ki pa pran dlo, pa pouri, pa gen pwoblèm tèrmit—ak mèb biwo, depo rad ak vanity—pare pou enstalasyon rapid.
hero.trustText: Deja 500+ fanmi ak biznis ki konfyans nan nou

whyPvc.title: Poukisa PVC nan Ayiti?
whyPvc.subtitle: Klima nou an gen chalè ak imidite. Kabann kizin PVC yo fèt pou sa.

moisture.title: Reziste imidite
moisture.description: Pa pran dlo, pa pouri nan sezon lapli yo

pests.title: Pa pran tèmni/termit
pests.description: Ensèk yo pa ka manje PVC—pa gen pwoblèm ak termit

cleaning.title: Netwaye fasil
cleaning.description: Yon ti savon ak dlo, epi yo vin pwòp nèt

transport.title: Pi lejè pou transpò
transport.description: Fasil pou monte nan depo a nan zonn ki difisil

eco.title: Bon pou anviwònman an
eco.description: Menas anviwònman an pi piti: mwens koupe pyebwa

process.title: Ki jan nou travay la?
process.subtitle: Sèlman 4 etap pou kizin nouvo ou a

measure.title: 1. Mezi
measure.description: Nou vin mezire espas ou a gratis—oswa ou ka suiv gid nou an

design.title: 2. Konsèy
design.description: Nou konsèye ou ak modèl ak koulè ki pi bon pou ou

manufacture.title: 3. Fabrike
manufacture.description: Nou fabrike kabann ou yo nan atèlye nou an ak presizyon

install.title: 4. Enstale
install.description: Nou vin enstale yo nan kay ou a—rapid ak pwòp

projects.title: Pwojè nou yo
projects.subtitle: Gade kisa nou deja fè nan Ayiti

otherProducts.title: Pi plis pase kizin yo
otherProducts.subtitle: Nou kreye tou mèb PVC pou biwo, depo rad ak salbeyen

vanity.title: Vanité Salbeyen
vanity.description: Vanité double ak senp ki reziste imidite

cta.title: Pare pou kòmanse?
cta.subtitle: Jwenn devis gratis ou an jodi a

products.title: Pwodwi nou yo
products.subtitle: Kabann kizin ak mèb PVC yo

calculator.title: Kalkilè Ekonomi 5 Ane
calculator.subtitle: Gade konbyen PVC ka ekonomize pou ou

contact.title: Kontak nou
contact.subtitle: Nou la pou reponn tout kesyon ou yo

footer.description: Kabann PVC ki pi bon nan Ayiti—dire, pwòp, ak rapid pou enstale.

home.title: PVC Cabinets Haiti by Zewo - Kizin ki dire nan klima Ayiti
home.description: Kabann PVC ki pa pran dlo, pa pouri, pa gen pwoblèm tèrmit. Pare pou enstalasyon rapid nan klima Ayiti. Devis gratis an 48h.

products.title: Pwodwi Kabann PVC - Koleksyon Konplè | PVC Cabinets Haiti
products.description: Dekouvri koleksyon konplè kabann PVC nou an: kabann debazi, akote, wo, ak salbeyen. Waterproof ak san termit.

pricing.title: Pri Kabann PVC ak Kalkilè Ekonomi | PVC Cabinets Haiti
pricing.description: Pri transparan ak kalkilè pou montre konbyen PVC ka ekonomize pase bwa nan 5 ane. Kòmanse nan HTG 45,000.
